title: Natural gas production - United States 1998 to 2018
summary: In general Production in billion cubic meters has rose over the Year.

Production in billion cubic meters is slightly increasing from 2009 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2013, slightly increasing from 2013 to 2014, roughly constant from 2014 to 2017, and finally slightly increasing from 2017 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
The highest Production in billion cubic meters, of value 831.8 was reached at Year 2018
Minimum Production in billion cubic meters about 557.6 was reached at Year 2009
min_summary: Overall Production in billion cubic meters has increased over the Year.
